# WEAPON::REQUEST_WEAPON_ASSET

## Summary
Request streaming to load a weapon asset

## Parameters
* **WEAPON_TYPE** weaponType
* **INT** weaponResourceFlags = 31
* **EXTRA_WEAPON_COMPONENT_RESOURCE_FLAGS** extraWeaponComponentFlags = 0: Used to load the non-default weapon components.

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Nearly every instance of p1 I found was 31. Nearly every instance of p2 I found was 0.

REQUEST_WEAPON_ASSET(iLocal_1888, 31, 26);
